divs: Sighting DetailsMy 2 friends and i were walking to my friends house and we looked up saw a flashing light that was yellow blue and green. Made a perfect triangle look kinda like it was above the clouds.. We went to take picture right when we got are phones out to take picture the light flashed twice and the light slowly faded away. After we were scared and went home
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 19th 2009
